section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:I heard Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying: The women of the Quraish are good amongst the womenfolk. They ride camels and show affection to their children and zealously guard the wealth of their husbands. Abu Huraira said at the end of this narration that Mary, the daughter of Imran, never rode the camel
